Class ReportManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc316.cleaning.manager.ReportManager
public class ReportManager extends Object
Class to handle different reporting and statistics given data.

      public ReportManager(String pathToRoomFile, String pathToLogFile, edu.ncsu.csc316.cleaning.dsa.DataStructure mapType) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructs the ReportManager with a given Map data structure.
      Parameters:
      pathToRoomFile - the path to the room file
      pathToLogFile - the path to the log file
      mapType - the map DS to use
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if either of the files are not found

  • Method Details

    • getVacuumBagReport

      public String getVacuumBagReport(String timestamp)
      Method to return a string of the vacuum bag report, which tells the date it was last replaced and the square feet it can vacuum before it is due for replacement.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - the time the bag was last replaced
      Returns:
      a string report about the bag given the replacement time

    • getFrequencyReport

      public String getFrequencyReport(int number)
      Method to return a string of the frequency report, which displays a given number of the most frequently cleaned rooms.
      Parameters:
      number - of rooms user wants to include in the report
      Returns:
      a string report of cleanings

    • getRoomReport
